ygData.subject: Re: Area Songs in Lguk [WAS:Does CHR affect Largos?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... With your knowledge of Lullaby now, would you even consider firing up that song in LGuk?  Lullaby was awesome when I used it, oh about 30 levels ago.  I
ygData.messageBody:
> When we were first exploring lower guk, back when there was 8-10 ppl in
> the zone, I used lullaby at least once on an over pull in the undead
> tower. It worked and we all lived.

With your knowledge of Lullaby now, would you even consider firing
up that song in LGuk? Lullaby was awesome when I used it, oh about
30 levels ago. I can't even keep 3 snakes asleep now.

> Another time we had an over pull (again in the undead tower) and I fired
> up screech to try to get 4 mobs off our druid so he could get off an
> evac.

That reminds me, always keep screech mem'd ;-)

[connecting to shadowmen thread] This is how a bard can outrun
shadowmen. Selo's + Screech. The shadowmen move so fast in the
opposite direction that they are out of agro radius within about
2 seconds and give up the chase. So if someone asks you if you
can outrun shadowmen, you can if you are creative. Just twist
Selos and Screech and take off.

Harmonic.
